meanings.definition: Becoming fluid when agitated and returning to a more solid state when left undisturbed.
meanings.sent1: The thixotropic gel became runny when stirred.
meanings.sent2: The paint is thixotropic, flowing easily when mixed.
meanings.sent3: The thixotropic pudding turned into a liquid dance party when shaken.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were thixotropic, shifting from solid to fluid with each mood swing.
meanings.sent5: The thixotropic lava oozed slowly down the volcano, solidifying as it cooled.
